Description:
Detects initiated network connections to crypto mining pools

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Network Communication With Crypto Mining Pool
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (dst_host = 'alimabi.cn' or dst_host = 'ap.luckpool.net' or dst_host = 'bcn.pool.minergate.com' or dst_host = 'bcn.vip.pool.minergate.com' or dst_host = 'bohemianpool.com' or dst_host = 'ca-aipg.miningocean.org' or dst_host = 'ca-dynex.miningocean.org' or dst_host = 'ca-neurai.miningocean.org' or dst_host =
